name: Ancient Power Unbound
text: This card is always treated as an "Omni" Spell. You can discard 1 card from your hand; Add 1 "Ancient" or Omni Spell/Trap from your Deck. All Omni Monsters on your side of the field gain 500 ATK every Standby Phase ignoring card effects. You can target up to 3 Omni Monsters and/or Omni or "Ancient" Spells/Trap Cards in your GY; return them to your Deck and draw 1 card. You can only use each effect of "Ancient Power Unbound" once per turn.
